title: Pixel 4 keeps rebooting when Wifi or Mobile data is activated
content:
Hi,
today my Pixel 4 suddenly kept restarting whenever i opened a app. I found out when i deactivated internet (Widi and mobile data) my pixel 4 is as stable as before. The same happenes in safe mode. When i activate wifi after a few seconds the phone starts to reboot again until i deactivate it.
Has anyone an idea what could cause the issue?
Thx in advance
